domain.description: The domain which the ssl cert is for (used for validation of the certificate files).

private_key_file.description: The private key pem file for the ssl certificate.

certificate_body_file.description: The body of the ssl certificate in the form of a pem file. This file should just have the final certificate and not other certificates on the chain

certificate_chain_file.description: The file containing the chain certificate for the current ssl certificate.
